document.full_text: 'the best is yet to come' is a revue tribute to cy coleman, whose songwriting career does not make for easy anthologizing.
document.title: theater review | 'the best is yet to come': brassy and bawdy, with fingers snapping
lines_and_colors: 'the best is yet to come' is a revue tribute to cy coleman, whose songwriting career does not make for easy anthologizing.
